title: OPEC+ Set to Keep Supply Steady Amid Turmoil, Delegates Say
description: OPEC+ delegates said they’re likely to stick with plans to pause supply increases in the first quarter at a meeting on Sunday, adding it’s too early to assess the impact of the shock US capture of Venezuela leader Nicolas Maduro.
content: OPEC+ delegates said they’re likely to stick with plans to pause supply increases in the first quarter at a meeting on Sunday, adding it’s too early to assess the impact of the shock US capture of Venezuela leader Nicolas Maduro.
